item.title: Showcase of Web Design in Russia
item.description: As part of Smashing Mag's Global Web Design series, they've created a showcase of Russian Web Design with Designcollector's Arseny Vesnin providing the commentary. http://www.smashingmagazine.com/2009/10/17/global-web-design-russia/
